TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Loma', title = Loma', year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Loma'} }

S.FORM: O pisanga' no 'Amis to loma' i,misi'ayaw to kasadakan no cidal. O pipawalian to panay ko sakapihaen nawhani, i i'ayaw no loma' ko potal ta caay ka 'ading ko pipawalian to panay. O satapangan no pisaloma' i, misongila' to sera to malopipatirengan to loma'. Lopayenho nangara ko sota'. O sapisaloma' to loma' no 'Amis o kilang,o 'aol,o penen, o folo'. Pili'en ko rakes a kilang to malo hecek no loma'.Onini a rakes a kilang i,caay ka kaen no 'aayad.Karkaren nangra ko sera a misatalolong to saka tanektek no katomireng no hecek.Mapateli i sepatay a toko ko safalat a 'alinonong('anonong) a kilang.
